wikipedia_page.main: Fighting with Wire (or FWW) were an alternative heavy rock and punk band hailing from Derry, Northern Ireland. They have toured with Biffy Clyro, Million Dead, Reuben, Twin Atlantic, yourcodenameis:milo, Kerbdog, Helmet, You Me At Six, Nomeansno, InMe, Brigade, Against Me!, Seafood, and Coheed and Cambria. They have also played at the Glasgowbury Festival and Belsonic.

response: *Recorded, Mixed, and Mastered by Jamie King
Jamie King (born 1972) is an American choreographer and director.
Jamie King may also refer to:
* Jamie King (producer), filmmaker, writer, and activist
* Jamie King (musician), North Irish bassist in the band Fighting With Wire
* Jamie King, fictional character in the American sitcom The Jamie Foxx Show played by Jamie Foxx
